meta.title: Strategic AI Solutions | For French Tech & SMBs
meta.description: Practical AI automation solutions for French businesses. From strategy to code, we build and ship AI tools that automate your operations.

hero.title: Strategic AI Solutions for French Tech & SMBs
hero.subtitle: We design and deploy practical AI tools that automate your business operations, combining technical expertise with strategic vision.

services.title: Productized AI Services
services.subtitle: Fixed-scope solutions with clear ROI and transparent pricing

service1.title: Automated Data Processing
service1.pitch: I automate the manual and repetitive task of data extraction from your emails, PDFs, spreadsheets or forms.
features: Custom integration with your CRM or database
benefits: Elimination of human errors in critical data
service1.useCaseText: Automation of daily PDF invoice processing in QuickBooks.

service2.title: Intelligent Internal Knowledge Base
service2.pitch: I build a chatbot that gives your team instant answers from your company documents.
features: RAG implementation with Pinecone for accurate answers
benefits: Half the onboarding time for new employees
service2.useCaseText: A research center for company procedures and policies.

service3.title: Custom Co-pilot for Customer Support
service3.pitch: I build an AI assistant for your support team that drafts high-quality responses aligned with your brand voice.
features: Integration with Zendesk, Intercom or Freshdesk
benefits: 50% reduction in average ticket processing time
service3.useCaseText: An AI co-pilot that suggests responses in Zendesk.

process.title: Our Strategic Process
process.subtitle: A focused approach that de-risks your AI investment

step1.title: Discovery & Strategy
step1.text: We identify your biggest problems and define clear success metrics with tangible ROI.

step2.title: Building & Prototype
step2.text: I build a functional prototype in 1-2 weeks to validate the solution before full implementation.

step3.title: Launch & Support
step3.text: Deployment of the production solution with documentation and ongoing support options.

questions.question: How do you ensure data security and GDPR compliance?
questions.answer: All solutions are designed with GDPR principles from the start. We can process data locally, use on-premise deployment or select compliant cloud providers.

questions.question: Which systems can you integrate with?
questions.answer: Most popular CRMs (Salesforce, HubSpot), databases, support platforms (Zendesk, Intercom) and document systems (Google Workspace, Confluence, SharePoint).

questions.question: What support do you provide after launch?
questions.answer: 30 days of support included, with optional ongoing maintenance packages. Complete documentation and training for your team.

questions.question: What is the typical timeline?
questions.answer: Prototype in 1-2 weeks, complete implementation in 4-8 weeks depending on complexity. We start with a concrete prototype to de-risk the project.

contact.subtitle: Book a free consultation or send us your project details

form.title: Send us a message
form.description: Share your project details and we'll get back to you within 24 hours

call.title: Schedule a call
call.description: 30-minute free consultation to discuss your needs

email.title: Email us directly
email.description: Prefer to start with an email? We're here to help.

points.title: GDPR Compliant
points.text: Data security built into every solution

points.title: 24h Response Time
points.text: We get back to you within one business day

success.title: Message Sent Successfully!
success.message: Thank you for your inquiry. We'll be in touch within 24 hours to discuss your project.

footer.tagline: Transforming Businesses with AI & Technology Solutions
footer.privacy: Data processing GDPR compliant. Your information is secure with us.

meta.title: Technical Overview | AI Automation & Knowledge Solutions
meta.description: Explore the technical stack and real-world portfolio behind AI automation, knowledge bases, and customer support co-pilots.

intro.title: Under the Hood: How My AI Solutions Work
intro.subtitle: This page provides a technical deep-dive into the architecture, technology stack, and real portfolio projects behind each AI service.

service1.tech_stack: Python, OpenAI GPT-4, Streamlit, pdfplumber, pandas
architecture: Document upload and text extraction
AI-powered data parsing and structuring
Validation and human review interface
Export to target system (CRM, database, spreadsheet)

service2.tech_stack: Python, OpenAI Embeddings, Pinecone, LangChain, Streamlit
architecture: Multi-format document processing and chunking
Vector embedding generation and storage
Semantic search and retrieval system
RAG-powered response generation

service3.tech_stack: Python, OpenAI GPT-4, Support Platform APIs, Custom Integration Layer
architecture: Ticket context analysis and intent classification
Knowledge base retrieval for relevant information
Brand-aligned response generation
Integration with support platform (Zendesk/Intercom)
service3.portfolio_stack: Python, OpenAI GPT-4, Knowledge Base Integration

closing.title: Ready to build your custom AI solution?

executive_summary.title: Project Overview: Intelligent Invoice Processing
executive_summary.problem_text: Manual invoice processing costs businesses 5-15 minutes per invoice and introduces costly human errors in critical financial data.
executive_summary.solution_text: An intelligent system that automatically extracts key business information from PDF invoices and converts it into structured, actionable data.

business_value.title: Business Value
business_value.proposition: Transform accounts payable from a cost center to a strategic advantage. Our AI-powered processor reduces invoice processing costs by 85% while providing real-time financial insights.
